thread.title: Lawyers want Klang custodial death case classified as murder
thread.title_full: Lawyers want Klang custodial death case classified as murder

title: Lawyers want Klang custodial death case classified as murder
text:
More Lawyers for the family of custodial death victim S Balamurugan want the case classified as murder and for investigations to be carried out swiftly and independently. N Surendran and Latheefa Koya in a statement today said four days have passed since Balamurugan's death at the North Klang Police Station and yet, not a single police personnel have been arrested or even suspended. 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
